snippet: LeBron James seemed to alternate fouls and fumbles, but he heated up in the fourth quarter and wound up with a game-high 32 points.
abstract: Miami Heat forward LeBron James scores game-high 32 points in Game 3 playoff victory over New York Knicks; Heat leads the series, 3-0.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James seemed to alternate fouls and fumbles, but he heated up in the fourth quarter and wound up with a game-high 32 points.

headline.seo: LeBron James Ends Foul Night With Flourish
headline.main: James Ends Foul Night With Flourish
headline.print_headline: Foul Trouble Can’t Keep James Down
